title: Requirements Gathering
description: Understand and document user needs, functional requirements, and system constraints for the HapticFeedbackSuit.

title: Design the Haptic Feedback System
description: Develop a conceptual design for the haptic feedback system in the suit, outlining its components and interactions.

title: Develop Haptic Sensors and Actuators
description: Design and implement the haptic sensors and actuators that will provide realistic feedback for different stimuli.

title: Create User Interface for Suit Control
description: Develop a user-friendly interface that allows users to customize haptic feedback settings.

title: Integrate Haptic Feedback with VR Software
description: Modify existing VR software to support the new haptic feedback system.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Suit Control

title: Conduct Preliminary Testing and Iterate Design
description: Test the suit's haptic feedback system, identify issues, and iterate on the design as necessary.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Suit Control

title: Assemble and Refine the Prototype
description: Construct a working prototype of the suit, incorporating the haptic feedback system.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Suit Control

title: Document the System Design and Implementation
description: Write technical documentation detailing the system design and implementation of the HapticFeedbackSuit.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Suit Control
